STATE of New Jersey, Plaintiff-Respondent,
v.
B.L. THOMAS-HUNTER a/k/a Thomas J. Berry, Lord Berry, Thomas Hunter BL, B.L. Thomas Hunter, Barry Thomas Hunter, BL Hunter, BL Thomas Hunter, B.L. Thomas, Barry Thomas, Barry L. Thomas, Barry Lee Thomas, Barry Thomas-Hunter, Berry Thomas-Hunter, BI Thomas-Hunter, BL Thomas-Hunter, Defendant-Petitioner. State of New Jersey, Plaintiff-Respondent,
v.
B.L. Thomas-Hunter a/k/a Thomas J. Berry, Lord Berry, Thomas Hunter BL, B.L. Thomas Hunter, Barry Thomas Hunter, BL Hunter, BL Thomas Hunter, B.L. Thomas, Barry Thomas, Barry L. Thomas, Barry Lee Thomas, Barry Thomas-Hunter, Berry Thomas-Hunter, BI Thomas-Hunter, BL Thomas-Hunter, Defendant-Petitioner. C-867 September Term 2017
080613 Supreme Court of New Jersey. May 21, 2018

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-4970/5531-15 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

*1290It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied.
